name: One Dungeon in Dice World
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. Navigate through a dungeon and roll an increasingly large number of dice. 

Controls:

WASD to move

R to roll dice in battle

Space to continue dialogue

Battle rules: First person to roll enough dice to meet the condition on screen will do damage to their opponent. The battle ends when one player has been knocked out. Winner gets the loser's dice.
